analysis.description:
BigbomToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#251) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#54)

BigbomToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#526-528) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#527-528)

BigbomTokenExtended.airDrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = bigbomToken.balanceOf(recipients[i]) (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#559-561)

Reentrancy in BigbomTokenExtended.airDrop (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#556-566):
	External calls:
	- amount = bigbomToken.balanceOf(recipients[i]) (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#559-561)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#563-564)
	- frozenAccount (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#563-564)
	- frozenTime (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#563-564)
	- maxAllowedAmount (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#563-564)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#54)
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#105-115) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/3/0x84f7c44b6fed1080f647e354d552595be2cc602f.sol#54-55) should be declared external
